title: River Street Sweets® | Savannah Pralines & Candy Gifts
text: Welcome to riverstreetsweets.com, where you can find Savannah's original candy store online. For 50 years, we have used our own family recipes to make the finest and freshest handmade Southern candies around. Be sure to look for some of our favorites like our Savannah Pralines, Chocolate Bear Claws, and Glazed Pecans. Our homemade Pecan Pies are also delicious and our creamy Fudge was voted a Top Food Find by Southern Living. Every gift basket is hand packed with care and will surely please any recipient. Our popular Grab Basket is perfect for any occasion and with 10 sizes, it is great for sharing! We even have a Corporate Gift Specialist to help with all your Business Gifts and our Customer Service Live Chat is always available to help with your order. All of our Handmade Southern Candies come with our 100% Guarantee. So take your time and browse Savannah's favorite Candy store online. We hope you have fun! Savor Every Sweet Moment! In 2023 we celebrated 50 Sweet Years in business. We are grateful for all of our fans and we invite everyone to savor every SWEET moment as we strive to help you create delicious memories with the best handmade Southern confections. Our family at River Street Sweets® is proud to share that we opened a new location on Broughton Street in our hometown, Savannah, Georgia. We are also so happy to be celebrating 50 years in business! And we are very humbled to have been chosen as Best Candy Store in Savannah again in 2025! We appreciate you and are thankful to be a part of your heartfelt celebrations and holiday traditions, and we are honored each time you send a gift from River Street Sweets® to make someone smile!
